EmailTemplate.name: SEVT-202304-HHS-ENT-HIMSS-2023.01c. - Invite 3
EmailTemplate.subject: Don't miss the chance to hear about the future of virtual care
EmailTemplate.textOnly: HIMSS23 April 17-21 See the future of virtual care today VISIT US AT BOOTH 225 HIMSS23 is here and we don't want you to miss this opportunity to connect with our virtual care experts. • Stop by Booth #225 <[[https://airtable.com/shr9JnW31Fob0DK9C]]> to see demos of our virtual nursing, telestroke and other first-of-kind solutions • Learn how our partnership with Microsoft Teams makes it even easier for care teams to collaborate About Teladoc Health: Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages more than a decade of expertise and data-driven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
